26/* This file defines OpenMP API entry points that accelerator targets are
27 expected to replace. */
28
29#include "libgomp.h"
30
31void
32omp_set_default_device (int device_num)
33{
34 struct gomp_task_icv *icv = gomp_icv (true);
35 icv->default_device_var = device_num >= 0 ? device_num : 0;
36}
37
38int
39omp_get_default_device (void)
40{
41 struct gomp_task_icv *icv = gomp_icv (false);
42 return icv->default_device_var;
43}
44
45int
46omp_get_num_devices (void)
47{
48 return gomp_get_num_devices ();
49}
50
51int
52omp_get_num_teams (void)
53{
54 /* Hardcoded to 1 on host, MIC, HSAIL? Maybe variable on PTX. */
55 return 1;
56}
57
58int
59omp_get_team_num (void)
60{
61 /* Hardcoded to 0 on host, MIC, HSAIL? Maybe variable on PTX. */
62 return 0;
63}
64
65int
66omp_is_initial_device (void)
67{
68 /* Hardcoded to 1 on host, should be 0 on MIC, HSAIL, PTX. */
69 return 1;
70}
71
72ialias (omp_set_default_device)
73ialias (omp_get_default_device)
74ialias (omp_get_num_devices)
75ialias (omp_get_num_teams)
76ialias (omp_get_team_num)
77ialias (omp_is_initial_device)
78
